The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 September is 332,984 (591.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 September, there were 19,046 new confirmed cases (33.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 September, there were 15,257 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 25% (3789 extra cases).
